snippet.title: GalaX (masaHG 2003)
snippet.description:
60fps video: https://www.twitch.tv/xaerock/v/64514623

Freeware shooter developed by masaHG in 2003. Official site & download: http://www003.upp.so-net.ne.jp/masaHG/glxmain.htm

Shmup centering around a hacking gimmick. You can command locked targets to freeze, self destruct or become an ally using a series of inputs. Has some great pixel art, setpieces and clever boss design. Very unknown for some reason. 
This video is just a 1CC on defaults. The last boss went really poorly. Audio cracking seems to be a problem with the newer version of OBS I was using
